
                            
                            <p>打开邮储银行APP，首页自动弹出，点进去领取就好了<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/07/170003pvn6kjs3lezbbzt8.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/07/170003pvn6kjs3lezbbzt8.jpg">	    	     <br> </p><p class="pl">打开首页弹分期。。</p><p class="pl">3个1，谢谢</p><p class="pl">无</p>
